mention.text: I who could have slept among the live flowers at last ; so for your arrogance and your ruthlessness I am swept back where dead lichens drip dead cinders upon moss of ash ; so for your arrogance I am broken at last , I who had lived unconscious , who was almost forgot ; if you had let me wait I had grown from listlessness into peace , if you had let me rest with the dead , I had forgot you
I who could have walked with the live souls above the earth
the live souls above the earth , and you who passed across the light and reached ruthless ; you who have your own light , who are to yourself a presence , who need no presence
the live souls above the earth
the earth , wild saffron that has bent over the sharp edge of earth , all the flowers that cut through the earth , all , all the flowers are lost ; everything is lost , everything
the earth , hyacinth colour caught from the raw fissure in the rock where the light struck , and the colour of azure crocuses
earth , all the flowers that cut through the earth , all , all the flowers are lost ; everything is lost
the earth , the whole of the flowers of the earth
the whole of the flowers of the earth
last , I who had lived unconscious , who was almost forgot
black and light grown colourless ; why did you turn back , that hell should be reinhabited of myself
your face caught with the flame of the upper earth , above my face
it you saw in my face
the light of your own face , the fire of your own presence ?
reflex of the earth , hyacinth colour caught from the raw fissure in the rock where the light struck , and the colour of azure crocuses
swift in its veins as lightning
very golden crocuses and the red
the very golden hearts of the first saffron
you who passed across the light and reached ruthless
you who have your own light

the earth and the flowers of the earth , and the live souls above the earth , and you who passed across the light and reached ruthless ; you who have your own light , who are to yourself a presence , who need no presence
no worse than your earth above the earth , hell is no worse , no , nor your flowers nor your veins of light nor your presence , a loss
your flowers nor your veins of light nor your presence , a loss
the fervour of myself for a presence
